name: Australia
startIntroPart2: Can you build a civilisation that can stand the test of time?
declaringWar: After thorough deliberation, Australia has considered you a threat to national sercurity. Prepare yourself, war is upon us..!
attacked: We will mobilise every means for resistance, to defend land and country.
defeated: The principals for which we have fought will survive longer than any nation you could ever build...
introduction: John Curtin, I speak for the people of Australia as their prime minister.
